overview: Aathava's parents will be killed by Villan Vathi Ganesh for money lending problem. After death of Aathava's parents, Ibrahim Routher best friend for Aathava's father will raise Aathava and his little brother. Aathava will revenge Vathi Ganesh for the lost of his parents 20 years later. Aathava will live as a fun person and a good human but his anger on Vathi Ganesh will lead till the climax.
title: Puli Vettai
